column1: * 1908 - Voice actor Patrick Barr is born.
* 1944 - John Tolkien is made an Exorcist and Acolyte in a ceremony at Stonyhust.
* 1979 - The Tolkien Quiz Book (by Bart Andrews) by Andrews and Zuber is published.
* 2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
column2: "The Ashen Wastes" is released in North America.
